name: Sisu Mies - Hirven Kosto
description:
A finnish mans tale about an horror moose hunt. The mooses turned ancient and evil after sipping some Lapin Kulta and now its up to Sisu Mies to defend the forest and restore peace.

Many finnish elements and quests and also alot of game mechanics and gameplay is not done since I got ROBBED! I got this project back but since my PC is stolen I only have this crappy laptop to submit my game thrue and cant edit it somehow neither , but here it is ..

[INCOMPLETE GAME]
